subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the Triple Crown champion, is a 1-5 favorite at the New York racetrack known as the Graveyard of Champions for humbling previous Triple Crown winners, including Gallant Fox, Secretariat and Affirmed.
snippet: American Pharoah, the Triple Crown champion, is a 1-5 favorite at the New York racetrack known as the Graveyard of Champions for humbling previous Triple Crown winners, including Gallant Fox, Secretariat and Affirmed.
